Name: Morning Star III
Description: The kindness once sown now bears fruit.
QuestDesc: The kindness once sown now bears fruit.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lenore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, Rover. One moment, I'm just finishing up with these rocks!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why are they having you break rocks? And this many?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lenore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The man in charge of it wanted to help the Troupe of Fools unload supplies, so I switched with him!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lenore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, no, no. Not at all! Mr. Fratello said all I need to do is "ignite" the hidden perseverance inside of me, and these rocks will be done in no time!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lenore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whoa! So you're "the world's strongest" Mr. Fratello was talking about!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There, all done. Come on, let's go meet the Troupe of Fools.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Troupe's made up of pilgrims. Is that why you're afraid to see them?

Dialogues.Speaker: Lenore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, it's not like that. I'm just not prepared...

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, you're in luck. The Troupe of Fools appreciates people who come unprepared.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lenore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I wish to live on, {PlayerName}! To work hard and make amends for my mistakes!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: For what it's worth, I don't think you've made any mistakes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lenore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, I was a child of the Order. The more kindly everyone treats me, the less I can shamelessly turn my back on it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lenore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I will do my best to live on until everyone forgives the Order. I'm sure that's what the brothers and sisters still serving it believe, too!
